description: Laptop only goes to login and does not shut down.

like other users i saw through the reviews, I thought it wasn't working. then i started playing with the preferences/settings and I've found that if you manually set the commands for /restart/shutdown it works. Try it!
summary: need improvements but it works if properly set

description:
Like the review "USER" gave, it will work with a tweak. When I first tried it, just like the other reviews indicate, it did not reboot. It did seem to kill processes, but simply brought me back to a locked page as if I only logged out.

Following the advice in teh review by "USER", I went into preferences and chose the "custom command" option for "reboot." Then I simply typed "reboot" in the command box. Now it completely reboots when it hits the scheduled day/time.
Funktioniert mit benutzerdefinierten Befehl shutdown -h now
no apaga mi pc, solo cierra la sesion
summary: solo cierra sesion , no lo apaga mi pc

description:
pestaña [edición] elegir [preferencias]
pestaña [acciones] marcar [Comando Personalizado]
click [apagar computadora]
escribir "shutdown -h now" 
[cerrar]
click [reiniciar computadora]
escribir "shutdown -r now"
[cerrar]
facil de configurar para apagar y reiniciar
